usage.cn: 許多的時候，讓我們放不下的其實並不是對方，而是那些逝去的共同回憶！
usage.eng: Many, let's not put it is not each other, but those fading common memories!

usage.cn: 所有的爱都是甜蜜的，无论是给予还是回报。爱就像阳光一样无所不在，它那熟悉的嗓音永远不会消沉。
usage.eng: All love is sweet, given or returned. Common as light is loved, and its familiar voice wearies not ever.
